DOC.brief_title: Effects Positive Energy Balance Exercise Appetite Hormones Sedentary Men Women
DOC.detailed_description: In randomized cross-over design , participant complete two separate six-day & seven night inpatient stay ( separate least 4 week ) University Wisconsin Hospital 's Clinical Translational Research Core ( CTRC ) . During six-day & seven night visit , participant feed energy balance diet ( energy intake = energy expenditure ) first three day follow three day overfeed ( 130 % energy balance diet ) . During one inpatient period , participant exercise twice daily ( morning , even ) total approximately 120 minute per day indoor exercise bicycle ~50 % maximal aerobic fitness . During inpatient visit , participant exercise inactive . The investigator examine effect short-term positive energy balance exercise 24-hour plasma level hormone relate hunger satiety . These hormone include leptin , ghrelin , insulin , peptide YY sedentary lean obese men woman . Our primary hypothesis obese person exercise , average 24-hour plasma leptin level increase obese individual overfeed compare energy balance feeding , fail sedentary condition . In contrast , investigator predict lean individual appropriate increase average 24-hour leptin level response overfeed regardless exercise treatment . Thus , investigator suggest failure average 24-hour leptin response overfeed set obese person continue slow weight gain , leptin hunger signal fails detect short-term overfeed produce response . The investigator hypothesize exercise promote improve insulin sensitivity increase leptin obese . The investigator predict change average 24-hour plasma leptin level correlate self-selected energy intake lean individual , overfeed plus exercise obese individual . In addition , hunger satiety response human complex , study characterize average 24-hour plasma level ghrelin , stimulate hunger , peptide YY , stimulate satiety fullness , lean obese individual determine plasma level alter obesity response short-term positive energy balance . Lastly , study involve bank blood tissue specimens future research . If decided analysis scientific value , genetic analysis conduct alteration gene involve synthesis , receptor , hunger satiety hormone investigate study design .
DOC.criteria: Healthy body mass index ( BMI ) = 19 < 25 kg/m2 Obese BMI = 30 < 35 kg/m2 Activity level = sedentary : Total energy expenditure/resting metabolic rate < 1.6 ( average US adult level ) Tobacco use Regular exercise physical activity , define > 2h/week moderate vigorous activity ; Individuals eat breakfast Weight loss > 3 % body weight previous six month Eating special diet ( e.g. , vegetarian lowcarbohydrate ) Current diagnosis , use prescription medication , thyroid dysfunction , type I type II diabetes , hypertension , cardiovascular , kidney , liver disease ; Taking prescription medication overthecountry product alter energy metabolism ( birth control pill ) Allergies food use study Individuals donate blood within 8 week prior enrollment plan give blood course study Claustrophobia History exercise intolerance , include diagnose exercise induce asthma physical limitation seat cycle aerobic exercise Blood chemistry excess 130 % upper normal level and/or hemoglobin hematocrit normal range . Females pregnant ( pregnancy status test begin 6day metabolic chamber stay ) , lactate , irregular menses
